entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric's bag split, indicating that he is the owner of the bag. He is also mentioned as speaking and picking up a book.

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Flitwick is mentioned as someone to whom Cedric wants Harry to tell that he's coming.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who slips his wand back into his robes and hurries up the corridor. He is also mentioned as speaking with Cedric.

entities.name: dragons
entities.description: The first task is dragons, indicating that it's a specific assignment or challenge.

entities.name: a guide to advanced transfiguration
entities.description: A Guide to Advanced Transfiguration is the book that Cedric picks up after his bag splits.

relationships.description: Harry and Cedric are friends, as indicated by their conversation and actions towards each other. Harry helps Cedric with his problem, and Cedric is concerned about the first task.
Harry is asked to tell Flitwick that Cedric is coming. This indicates a connection between Harry and Flitwick, as well as between Flitwick and Cedric.
Cedric is assigned the task of dealing with dragons. This indicates a connection between Cedric and the task, as well as between Cedric and Harry who informs him about it.
